exceptions.tactic: intros a b [ja jb] J R.
destruct (SAabsA a b ja (fst J) (fst R)) as [e1 [ea [J1 R1']]].

original: split. - intros a b R1 R2 [ja jb] J. destruct (SAabsA a b R1 ja) as [e1 [ea [J1 R1']]]. destruct (SAabsB a b R2 jb) as [e2 [eb [J2 R2']]]. exists (e1, e2), (ea, eb). split. + split; auto. + split. * now apply R1'. * now apply R2'. - intros a b [ja jb] J R. destruct (SAabsA a b ja (fst J) (fst R)) as [e1 [ea [J1 R1']]]. destruct (SAabsB a b jb (snd J) (snd R)) as [e2 [eb [J2 R2']]]. exists (e1, e2), (ea, eb). split. + split; auto. + split. * now apply R1'. * now apply R2'.
